      boolean dispatchKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      CTRL-X - exit the game, the current game state will be lost, the next time the game is started, it will resume from the last unfinished level CTRL-S - exit the game, saves the game state, game will resume next time the application will be started CTRL-R - resume a saved game CTRL-P - start a new game at the last unfinished level CTRL-1 - start a new game at level 1 SPACE - pause the game and display a �game is paused� dialog ESC - close the �game is paused� dialog and resume the game UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT ARROWS -- move Chap within the maze

        private void exitGame()
        Exit the game, the current game state will be lost, the next time the game is started, it will resume from the last unfinished level.

        Resume a saved game. Enables save game and resume options if clicked when game is in motion.

        private void addButtons()

      • dispatchKeyEvent

        public boolean dispatchKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        CTRL-X - exit the game, the current game state will be lost, the next time the game is started, it will resume from the last unfinished level CTRL-S - exit the game, saves the game state, game will resume next time the application will be started CTRL-R - resume a saved game CTRL-P - start a new game at the last unfinished level CTRL-1 - start a new game at level 1 SPACE - pause the game and display a �game is paused� dialog ESC - close the �game is paused� dialog and resume the game UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT ARROWS -- move Chap within the maze
        Specified by:
